law.catch_line: When owner shall remove number and validation sticker.
law.text:
The person whose name appears on a certificate of number as the owner of a vessel shall remove the number and validation sticker from the vessel when:
The vessel is documented by the Coast Guard; or
The certificate of number is invalid under KRS 235.180; or
The vessel is no longer principally used in the state where the certificate was issued.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 263, sec. 25, effective June 17, 1978.
